title: Paul Component Engineering Series One Random Klampers
content:
Want a truly unique pair of Klampers, hand assembled from random anodizing colors, complete with a certificate of authenticity? Look no longer! The Paul Component Engineering Series One is just that. Each pair of Klampers is a one-of-one colorway in a sealed box with certificate of authenticity included. The boxes are chosen at random upon ordering and we donâ€™t even know which box has each colorway.

Check out more at Paul Component Engineering!
